item.title: Coroth
item.description: Overview Coroth was a Morellic city state and civilisation founded in the Minikin Neolithic Era. The land of Coroth was situated in the continental forests of southern Tseireph, to the east of Darvara.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: Overview Sarvara (Sarvaran: ‘Sarvárą’ IPA: /sar.vá.rã/) was a Morellic city state and a civilisation whose society, territory, and culture extended beyond its original city walls.

item.title: Thnayya
item.description: Overview Thnayya was a prehistoric civilisation of minikin in the 2nd realm. It was located in south Tseireph, in a time when the sea levels were lower, and is now located in the Aqhoran strait off the coast of the Sarvaran river basin.
